org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.convert
Class Geometry2AWT

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.convert.Geometry2AWT

public class Geometry2AWT
extends Object

Utility class to support conversions between GEF4's geometry API and AWT Java2D's geometry API.

Method Summary
static AffineTransform toAWTAffineTransform(AffineTransform t)
          Converts a GEF AffineTransform into a AWT AffineTransform
static Line2D.Double toAWTLine(Line l)
          Converts a GEF4 Line into a AWT Line2D.

          Converts a GEF4 Point into a AWT Point2D with double precision.

          Converts a given array of GEF4 Points into an array of AWT Point2Ds.

Method Detail

toAWTAffineTransform

public static AffineTransform toAWTAffineTransform(AffineTransform t)
Converts a GEF AffineTransform into a AWT AffineTransform

Parameters:
t - the AffineTransform to transform
Returns:
a new AffineTransform representing an identical transformation

toAWTLine

public static Line2D.Double toAWTLine(Line l)
Converts a GEF4 Line into a AWT Line2D.

Parameters:
l - the Line to transform
Returns:
a new Line2D, which is constructed by using the start ( Line.getP1()) and end (Line.getP2()) points of the passed in Line

toAWTPoint

public static final Point2D.Double toAWTPoint(Point p)
Converts a GEF4 Point into a AWT Point2D with double precision.

Parameters:
p - the Point to convert
Returns:
a new Point2D, which is constructed using the x and y values of the provided Point

toAWTPoints

public static Point2D.Double[] toAWTPoints(Point[] pts)
Converts a given array of GEF4 Points into an array of AWT Point2Ds.

Parameters:
pts - the array of Points to convert
Returns:
an array of new Point2Ds, which are constructed using the x and y values of the provided Points

toAWTRectangle

public static final Rectangle2D.Double toAWTRectangle(Rectangle r)
Converts a GEF4 Rectangle into a AWT Rectangle2D. Note that the new Rectangle2D is simply constructed by using the values of the passed in Rectangle, not compensating the fact that the width and height of a rectangle are interpreted differently in Java2D and GEF4.

Parameters:
r - the Rectangle to convert
Returns:
a new Rectangle2D, which is constructed using the x, y, width, and height values of the passed in Rectangle.

toAWTRoundRectangle

public static RoundRectangle2D toAWTRoundRectangle(RoundedRectangle r)
Converts a GEF4 RoundedRectangle into a AWT RoundRectangle2D. Note that the new RoundRectangle2D is simply constructed by using the values of the passed in RoundedRectangle, not compensating the fact that the width and height of a rectangle are interpreted differently in Java2D and GEF4.

Parameters:
r - the RoundedRectangle to convert
Returns:
a new RoundRectangle2D, which is constructed using the x, y, width, height, arcWidth, and arcHeight values of the passed in RoundedRectangle
